title: Restructuring of the GOLD Programming Language
content:
An alternative was created for the GOLD programming language used by the Universidad de los Andes in the subject of Languages and Machines, in order to provide students with a tool with readable and easy-to-use documentation.

Link to the project's main page

title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
content: Full Stack projects were carried out with individual clients using cutting-edge tools such as Vue.js, Firebase, and Golang to ensure long-term maintainability

title: Python Tutoring at Universidad de los Andes
content: Tutoring was provided to students in programming areas using the Python language through the Cupitaller support and learning center at Universidad de los Andes.
